useCase: Add Bank Account to a User Account

Add a valid bank account to a user.description: A valid bank account should be added to the user
input: Input an account ID in the 'Enter Account ID' field
output: A row should be added in the table of account

Add a same account to a user.description: An account should not be added to the same user twice
input: Input an account ID in the 'Enter Account ID' field
output: Failure, the account is not added
An error window displays all the errors

Add an account used by another user.description: An account used by another user should not be added to another user
input: Input an account ID in the 'Enter Account ID' field
output: Failure, the account is not added
An error window displays all the errors
